sources.name: TestStreamingData
sources.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as string,
		StreamEnd as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TestStreamingData

sinks.name: FinalTestStreamingData
sinks.script:
TestStreamingData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FinalTestStreamingData
